description:
Iida Yoshimi is http://anidb.net/ch148706 [Kenzou]`s mother and a friend of http://anidb.net/ch148708 [Ugumori Etsuko], whom she had known since their school days.
Unable to ignore the abuse that Etsuko was receiving from her mother-in-law she orchestrated Etsuko`s disappearance, making it seem like she was "spirited away". Years later she also helps reunite Etsuko with her then left-behind daughter, http://anidb.net/ch148711 [Ayano].
name: Iida Yoshimi
